name: pnp-powerplatform-snippets-launch-browser-chrome
title: Launch Browser - Chrome Snippet
shortDescription: This is a snippet that can be used to launch a new instance of the Google Chrome browser that resolves any issues that could occur due to the extension for Chrome failing to load properly.
longDescription: This is a snippet that can be used to launch a new instance of the Google Chrome browser that resolves any issues that could occur due to the extension for Chrome failing to load properly.
